text: Local government minister swears in new board members for ILGS, LUSPA.
translated: Minisita fún ìjọba ìbílẹ̀ búra àwọn ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ ìgbìmọ̀ tuntun fún ILGS, LUSPA.
backtranslated: The Minister of Local Government swears in the members of the new committee for ILGS, LUSPA.

text: Farmers to receive $5,040 per tonne of cocoa for 2025/2026 season.
translated: Awon agbe lati gba $5,040 fun tone kan ti koko fun igba 2025/2026.
backtranslated: Farmers to receive $5,040 per ton of cocoa for the 2025/2026 season.

text: Obofour and Agradaa must settle their beef in court instead of social media – Onegod.
translated: Obofour àti Agradaa gbọdọ ṣe àwọn àròpọ̀ wọn nílé-ẹjọ́ dídájọ́ kì í ṣe lórí media àwùjọ – Onegod.
backtranslated: Obofour and Agradaa should be making their claims in court and not on social media  Onegod.

text: I'm saying, this after the first budget has been presented, so check the allocations.
translated: N ó sọ, èyí lẹ́hìn tí a ti ṣe àkọ́kọ́ ìsúnú owó, nítorí náà ṣàyẹ̀wò àwọn ìpín owó
backtranslated: I would say, this is after we've done the initial funding, so consider the funding allocations.

text: It strengthens their hand in demanding climate finance, asserting legal claims for damages, and holding high-emitting nations accountable.
translated: Ó fún wọn ní agbára láti béèrè ìsúnà ojú ọjọ, láti fi ẹ̀tọ́ òfin jáde fún ìbẹ̀rù, àti láti mú orílẹ̀-èdè tí ń ta ìdààmú rọ̀lẹ̀ sí ojú ọ̀nà òfin.
backtranslated: It gave them the power to ask for weather, to issue laws for fear, and to bring a troubled nation to the path of law.

text: Fadil Yusif outwitted his colleagues in the male 1km race to win the battle.
translated: Fadil Yusif ṣe àṣeju àwọn ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ rẹ̀ ní ìdíje ẹsẹ̀ 1km àwọn ọkùnrin láti gba ìdíje náà.
backtranslated: Fadil Yusif led his teammates in the men's 1km race to win the competition.

text: Do you know the last thing that went through my mind seconds before I got shot? Me.
translated: Ṣé o mọ̀ ohun t’ó kọ́rìí ṣáájú kí wọ́n yì mí l’ọfà? Mo mọ̀.
backtranslated: Do you know what I witnessed before I was beaten?

text: All right, take my car. Give it to him and tell him to ring me.
translated: Ó dára, mú ọkọ̀ ayọ́kẹ́lẹ́ mi. Fún un ní ọkọ̀ ayọ́kẹ́lẹ́ náà kí ó sì sọ fún un pé kí ó pe mí.
backtranslated: Give him the car and tell him to call me.

text: Other people who are looking for jobs, if they hadn't won, then they will be parliamentary candidates who had worked for the party.
translated: Awon eniyan miran ti won n wa ise, ti won ko ba ja, lona miran won yio je awon oludije asofin ti won ti se isẹ fun egbe na.
backtranslated: Other people who are looking for work, if not fighting, will be parliamentary candidates who have worked for the party.

text: A government that wants to work at this can collaborate effectively with civil society.
translated: Ijoba ti o ba fẹ lati ṣiṣẹ ni eyi le ṣiṣẹpọ daradara pẹlu awujọ ọlàgbara.
backtranslated: A government that wants to work in this can work well with a civilized society.

text: A lot of new MPs are battling with campaign expenses and other challenges, so they need to be guided.
translated: Ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn ọmọ ilé ìgbìmọ̀ aṣòfin tuntun n tiraka pẹ̀lú ìnáwo ìdìbò àti àwọn ìṣòro míràn, nítorí náà wọ́n nílò ìtọ́ni.
backtranslated: Many new MPs are struggling with election expenses and other issues, so they need guidance.

text: It's time to feed your faith and starve your doubts.
translated: Ó ti tó láti bọ́ ìgbàgbọ́ rẹ l'ojún àti pa ìyàlẹ́nu rẹ l'èé
backtranslated: It's enough to shake your faith and quench your wonder

text: It's time to feed on the word of God.
translated: Ó ti tó láti jẹ̀ ọ̀rọ̀ Olórun
backtranslated: It is enough to eat the word of God

text: Thanks be to God who causes us to triumph always by Christ Jesus.
translated: Ọlọpe f'Ọlọrun ń jẹ, ẹni tí ó ma n mú wa ja nígbà gbogbo nípasẹ̀ Kristi Jesu.
backtranslated: But thanks be to God, who always leads us in battle ready for battle through Christ Jesus.

text: This man brain must be protected, he is powerful respect sir.
translated: Ọpọlọ ọkunrin yìí gbọdọ̀ dáàbò, ó lágbára ọ̀wọ̀ rẹ̀ sir
backtranslated: This man's brain must be protected, it is strong sir

text: I am Ga and proud of the asante.
translated: Mo jẹ Ga ati pe mo ni igogoro ninu asante
backtranslated: I am tall and I have a height in the grate

text: Some of us Ga trace our lineage to some akan tribes.
translated: Àwọn kan wa lára wa Ga tọ wa lati inu awọn ẹ̀yà Akan kan.
backtranslated: Some of us Ga were from some Akan tribes.
